name: City Rebirth
description:
City Rebirth:

A small city builder where you can grow your city.

Controls:

WASD - Move

QE - Rotate camera

Left Click - Select, Place and destroy buildings

R - Rotate selected buildings

Esc - Exit build mode

How to Play:

Adding housing will increase your population while adding commerce buildings will start earning the city revenue. Try and get a nice mix of the two. Housing will be upgraded over time to allow more residents to stay.
